reviewText: Yes it was a wonderful gift for my husband who had the honor of meeting and getting to know General James Gavin!
Excellent series with in-depth first person interviews. Highly Recommended!!!!!

David Schifter's portrayal of Col. James Gavin was both accurate and respectable. Not only does the actor have an uncanny resemblance to the American hero, he obviously did his research into the character.
  "Combat Jump" is well worth watching for a look at how a man went against all of the odds to win this aerial assault battle during WW2.
